title: 1989–90 National Division One
text:
The 1989–90 Courage League was the third season of competitive league <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> in England.
<a href="Wasps%20FC">Wasps</a> were the champions, beating <a href="Gloucester%20RFC">Gloucester</a> by just one point. <a href="Bedford%20Blues">Bedford</a> were relegated.
Results.
The home team is listed in the left column.
